resources.string: A technology enthusiast with over 10+ years of hands-on experience in developing software for mobile,web and desktop. Expert in creating the scalable and maintainable architecture for mobile apps by combining frameworks and tools build from scratch or using commercial/ noncommittal solutions developed by other vendors.Exposed to server side technologies and proficient in data structures and conformable in using them to visualise the data using mobile UI frameworks. Had been part of game development during the initial period of my career. Experienced in managing the team and mentoring them.

The last company I was working with (till 22 Sept 2017) is Neva Innovation Labs Pvt.Ltd, Bangalore, India. Our head office is at Silicon Valley US. I was heading the android developments for this company. Our most recent product is in health domain. It is a combination of Nano technology, Android, ML(Machine Learning) and AI (Artificial Intelligence).

My core experience is in android application development, I am good in android framework, Android SDK, Tensorflow, Java and Kotlin. I have 10+ years of extensive software development experience, in which last 8+years is in Android and 8 months in IoS development. Among my 45+ Android applications, some of them were in top ten in android market during certain periods 1.6 years was with Samsung in South Korea with their android team for Samsung Galaxy S, Galaxy S2, CHIFF, Sprint S, and Honeycomb Tablet. I have also android experience on specific embedded devices from NComputing, application for Cisco setup box, Payback.

I love to talk about technology and find my own time to keep upto date with all the new things which is evolving in technology. I also help people to develop their skills by closely woking along with them or through opensource portals such as Stackoverflow, Github etc. I am holding a valid NZ open work visa, living at Auckland at present and available immediately.
